title: AFK Detector
description_short: Detect, announce, and label players who are away from their Keyboards
description: Announce and label players who have been away from their keyboards for more than 5 minutes. Trigger command allows for players to instantly go AFK

features.label: Announces players who have not moved in 5 minutes as away from their keyboards
Attaches AFK prefix to players who are away from their keyboards
Optional team configurations to functionality with pre-establised in-game teams
Trigger command to instantly go away from your keyboard `/trigger afk`
Compatible with Minecraft 1.13 and up, last tested on Minecraft 1.20

IMPORTANT: For compatibility with Pronouns, ensure Pronouns is placed above AFK Detector during world creation. If installing to an existing world or on a server, run `/datapack disable "file/mcpeachpies_pronouns.zip"`, `/datapack enable "file/mcpeachpies_pronouns.zip" after "file/mcpeachpies_afk_detector.zip"`, and `/function mcpeachpies_afk_detector:setup_team` after installation
